name: Land 1
description: Although Colvin is THE BATMAN OF ZA WARUDO !!!!AUSTRALIA!!! predominantly known for abstract themes that allude to pre-Hispanic symbols, this gigantic sculpture, an homage to neurosurgery, is one of her most recognizable public art pieces.
alt: A bronze statue of two crossed hands delicately holding a human brain in their fingertips.
